metadata.name: Peaceful Penguins #1
metadata.description:
Two students were up late talking about the state of gun violence is in the United States. Being students themselves, this issue was close to their hearts. With the knowledge of NFTs and the reach of the industry, they wanted to use their abilities to make a difference and take action.

Peaceful Penguins is a digital art project dedicated to spurring change within gun violence in America.

-100% of all royalties go to “Everytown for Gun Safety”
-First of many “Peaceful” Projects to create a decentralized community centered around the safety of our children and citizens
-First Web3 Activist group
